results.title: The Sapphires
results.creator_credit: Wayne Blair, Tony Briggs, Keith Thompson, Rosemary Blight, Melinda Doring, Gordon Westman, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
results.brief_description: It’s 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when they entertain the US troops in Vietnam as singing group The Sapphires.

constellations_other.name: Setting the record straight
constellations_other.description: For too long, the history of Australia was only told in mainstream films through a white lens. First Nations people have used the camera as a means of truth-telling and setting the record straight for decades.

constellations_other.name: Sequins and sapphires
constellations_other.description: Two of the most striking costumes on the big and small screens embody the glamour of leading First Peoples ladies.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Blair, Tony Briggs, Keith Thompson, Rosemary Blight, Melinda Doring, Gordon Westman, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
results.description: It’s 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when they entertain the US troops in Vietnam as singing group The Sapphires.
description_for_label: It’s 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when they entertain the US troops in Vietnam as singing group The Sapphires.

video_links.name: THE SAPPHIRES - Own it on Blu-ray, Digital & DVD

results.title: The Revenant
results.creator_credit: M Productions, Alejandro González Iñárritu and Mark L. Smith
results.headline_credit: Canada, Hong Kong, Taiwan and United States of America, 2015
results.brief_description: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.

constellations_other.name: Fish-eyes and fun times
constellations_other.description: This Constellation starts with The Favourite and ends up at Rambo, and was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: M Productions, Alejandro González Iñárritu and Mark L. Smith
results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, Hong Kong, Taiwan and United States of America, 2015
results.description: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.
description_for_label: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.

creators_other.name: Hong Kong Alpha Motion Pictures Co.

video_links.name: The Revenant | Official Trailer [HD] | 20th Century FOX

results.title: The Reader
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2008
results.brief_description: German lawyer Michael Berg has an affair with an older woman while a teenager who is later put on trial for her actions at a concentration camp. He alone realises that she is illiterate and may be concealing that fact at the expense of her freedom.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.description: The story of Michael Berg, a German lawyer who, as a teenager in the late 1950s, had an affair with an older woman, Hanna, who then disappeared only to resurface years later as one of the defendants in a war crimes trial stemming from her actions as a concentration camp guard late in the war. He alone realizes that Hanna is illiterate and may be concealing that fact at the expense of her freedom.
description_for_label: The story of Michael Berg, a German lawyer who, as a teenager in the late 1950s, had an affair with an older woman, Hanna, who then disappeared only to resurface years later as one of the defendants in a war crimes trial stemming from her actions as a concentration camp guard late in the war. He alone realizes that Hanna is illiterate and may be concealing that fact at the expense of her freedom.

results.title: The Rats of Tobruk
results.brief_description: Three friends enlist in the Australian Army and serve in North Africa, holding the city of Tobruk against Rommel’s forces.

constellations_other.name: Australia and WW2
constellations_other.description: A constellation exploring representations of Australians during World War 2.

results.description: Three friends enlist in the Australian Army and serve in North Africa, holding the city of Tobruk against Rommel’s forces.
description_for_label: Three friends enlist in the Australian Army and serve in North Africa, holding the city of Tobruk against Rommel’s forces.

results.title: The Rainmaker
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Constellation Entertainment, Michael Herr, Howard Cummings, Francis Ford Coppola, Steven Reuther, Fred Fuchs, Michael Douglas and Aggie Guerard Rodgers
results.brief_description: When Rudy Baylor, a young attorney with no clients, goes to work for a seedy ambulance chaser, he wants to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company. But to take on corporate America, Rudy and a scrappy paralegal must open their own law firm.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, Constellation Entertainment, Michael Herr, Howard Cummings, Francis Ford Coppola, Steven Reuther, Fred Fuchs, Michael Douglas and Aggie Guerard Rodgers
results.description: When Rudy Baylor, a young attorney with no clients, goes to work for a seedy ambulance chaser, he wants to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company. But to take on corporate America, Rudy and a scrappy paralegal must open their own law firm.

results.title: The Quiet American
results.creator_credit: Miramax, Intermedia Films, Mirage Enterprises, William Horberg, Robert Schenkkan, Staffan Ahrenberg, Roger Ford, Christopher Hampton, Phillip Noyce, IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG, Giai Phong Film Studio, Saga Pictures and Matthias Deyle
results.headline_credit: Australia, Germany, United Kingdom, United States of America and Vietnam, 2002
results.brief_description: A stylish political thriller where love and war collide in Southeast Asia. Set in early 1950s Vietnam, a young American becomes entangled in a dangerous love triangle when he falls for the beautiful mistress of a British journalist. As war is waged around them, these three only sink deeper into a world of drugs, passion, and betrayal where nothing is as it seems.

constellations_other.name: Uncovering the truth
constellations_other.description: The images of Tank Man during the Tiananmen Square protests in 1989 were captured by photojournalists and shared around the world. The work of journalists has been key to uncovering abuses of power and are rich material for fictional and factual movies and TV.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Miramax, Intermedia Films, Mirage Enterprises, William Horberg, Robert Schenkkan, Staffan Ahrenberg, Roger Ford, Christopher Hampton, Phillip Noyce, IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG, Giai Phong Film Studio, Saga Pictures and Matthias Deyle

Set in early 1950s Vietnam, a young American becomes entangled in a dangerous love triangle when he falls for the beautiful mistress of a British journalist. As war is waged around them, these three only sink deeper into a world of drugs, passion, and betrayal where nothing is as it seems.

results.title: The Producers
results.brief_description: Broadway producer, Max Bialystock and his accountant, Leo Bloom plan to make money by charming little old ladies to invest in a production many times over what it will actually cost, and then put on a sure-fire flop, so nobody will ask for their money back – and what can be a more certain flop than a tasteless musical celebrating Hitler.

constellations_other.name: Undercutting extremism with absurdity
constellations_other.description: Taika Waititi's satirical performance as Adolf Hitler in Jojo Rabbit connects to a number of other portrayals that includes ill-fated (and conceived) TV shows, memes, high camp and cinema classics.

results.description: Broadway producer, Max Bialystock and his accountant, Leo Bloom plan to make money by charming little old ladies to invest in a production many times over what it will actually cost, and then put on a sure-fire flop, so nobody will ask for their money back – and what can be a more certain flop than a tasteless musical celebrating Hitler.

results.title: The Princess and the Frog
results.brief_description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion and animation superstars
constellations_other.description: Despite the ease of new technology and a legacy going back to the beginning of cinema, stop-motion animation techniques are as popular as ever.

results.description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

video_links.name: The Princess and the Frog - Trailer

results.title: The Prestige
results.brief_description: Hugh Jackman and Christian Bale star as a pair of duelling illusionists in this mind-bending period drama from visionary director Christopher Nolan.
results.description: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy — full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.
description_for_label: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy — full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.

results.title: The Player
results.brief_description: Robert Altman’s adaptation of Michael Tolkin’s 1988 novel skewers the Hollywood film industry in a searing, satirical black comedy about a studio executive driven to murder.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

results.description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?
description_for_label: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?
